website.name: Vybri

webpage.name: Vybri: AI-Powered Wellness Coaching Platform
webpage.description: Scale your impact, not your burnout. Help clients thrive with AI-powered tools for wellness professionals.

software_application.name: Vybri
software_application.description: AI-powered platform for wellness professionals to scale income, create high-impact content, and deliver digital programs.
software_application.keywords: wellness coaching, health coaching, client engagement, digital programs, subscriptions, AI for coaches

organization.name: Vybri Wellness Coaching Platform
organization.description: AI-powered platform for wellness professionals to scale their impact.

faq.question: How does Vybri help wellness professionals?
faq.answer: Vybri helps wellness professionals scale their practice by providing AI-powered tools to create content, support more clients, and generate insights from client interactions—while maintaining the personal touch that makes coaching effective.

faq.question: Is Vybri HIPAA-compliant?
faq.answer: Yes, Vybri is built with security and privacy as top priorities. Our platform is fully HIPAA-compliant and uses enterprise-grade encryption to protect all client data and communications.

faq.question: How much does Vybri cost?
faq.answer: Vybri offers flexible pricing plans designed for wellness professionals at different stages. We currently have a limited early access program with special pricing. Contact us for details on our pricing tiers.

faq.question: Can I integrate Vybri with my existing tools?
faq.answer: Yes, Vybri is designed to integrate with popular coaching and healthcare platforms. We currently support integrations with calendar systems, EMRs, and communication tools to fit seamlessly into your workflow.

navigation.logo_alt: Vybri logo - AI-powered wellness coaching platform

hero.headline: Carpe Diem
hero.subheadline: After 50 years around the sun, live each day to its fullest
hero.image_caption: Create unforgettable experiences with fellow travelers

problem.title: Problem
problem.subtitle: Wellness coaches face major hurdles in today's evolving care landscape.

items.title: Limited income and client reach
items.description: Time-based sessions cap income and scale. Low margins make growth difficult without burnout.

items.title: Low visibility into client engagement
items.description: Coaches lack tools to monitor trust, compliance, and engagement between sessions.

items.title: Generic and time-draining tech
items.description: Delivering digital care means piecing together video hosting, website, social media, email, and client tracking tools—distracts from client time.

solution.title: Solution
solution.subtitle: Wellness professionals need a smarter way to grow—without more sessions or staff.

items.title: Earn passive income and scale your reach
items.description: Turn your expertise into subscriptions, digital programs, and on-demand care—no more trading time for money.

items.title: Boost trust and retention through personalization
items.description: Deliver personalized care plans and dynamic updates based on client behavior and feedback.

items.title: Purpose-built AI platform for Wellness Coaches
items.description: Manage your entire content-based practice: subscriptions, client engagement, and digital programs—all in one place, so you can focus on clients, not tech.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.subtitle: Vybri helps wellness coaches grow in three distinct ways—without more sessions or staff.

steps.title: Create once, earn passively
steps.time: Takes less than 15 minutes to invite hundreds—or even thousands—of clients.
items: Create your SEO-optimized professional profile—we'll pre-build it from your website, social bio, or résumé.
Upload or link your program resources: videos, protocols, guides, and handouts—text, voice, and video in one place.
Bundle these assets into subscription programs and digital products; set your own pricing.
Upload your audience or sync contacts from your existing tools.
Send smart invitations that automatically match clients to the right program and kickstart progress.

steps.title: Personalize plans in minutes
steps.time: Takes less than 5 minutes per client.
items: Use intake notes or voice-record a quick summary; optionally pull notes from your existing tools.
Select—or let Vybri suggest—the recommendations, lessons, and progression methods each client needs.
Generate and deliver an AI-personalized plan with daily reminders, micro habits, and progress milestones.

steps.title: Grow your brand every week
steps.time: Takes less than 15 minutes per week to stay top of mind.
items: Record research topics, sessions feedback, or new ideas on your phone.
Let AI transform them into relevant blogs, emails, and social media posts.
Convert textual content to voice or video (or vice versa) instantly
Auto-publish across your website, YouTube shorts, newsletter, and social channels—all scheduled for you.

why_vybri.title: Why Choose Vybri
why_vybri.subtitle: Transform your practice with our AI-powered platform

steps.title: Generate recurring, passive income
steps.description: Turn your methodology, videos, and guides into subscriptions and on-demand plans—so you earn between visits, not just during sessions.

steps.title: Strengthen trust with personalized care
steps.description: Deliver care plans that auto-adapt to each client's goals, adherence, and feedback—with timely nudges that keep them on track and coming back.

steps.title: Grow your brand on autopilot
steps.description: Full automation: AI repackages your content into blogs, social posts, podcasts, and videos that auto-publishes on schedule, and optimizes based on what's working—without costing client time.

setup_options.title: How To Get Started
setup_options.subtitle: Launching your digital practice on Vybri is easy. Set it up in 30 minutes or let us do it for you.

steps.title: Create your profile
steps.description: Vybri AI helps you build a professional, SEO-optimized profile ready to link with Instagram, YouTube, or other platforms.

steps.title: Add your services
steps.description: Upload your care plans, programs, exercise libraries, subscriptions, and supplements in one dashboard.

steps.title: Invite clients
steps.description: Send invites to current and past clients with new digital care plans tailored to their recovery and performance goals.

steps.title: Publish expert content
steps.description: Turn your notes and videos into posts, guides, and emails—generated instantly to grow your brand.

options.option_title: Option 2: We Set It Up (One-time fee: $990)
options.description: Let our Digital Practice Concierge Service do the heavy lifting:
steps: Done-for-you profile optimized for search and social media presence
Upload and organization of your services, care plans, and wellness product recommendations
Setup of your client base and invitations for care plan subscriptions
Launch content including blogs, videos, and social posts (up to 10 assets)*
options.footnote: *After setup, you continue to use Vybri to grow and scale your practice.

features.title: Features Built for Wellness Coaches
features.subtitle: Everything you need to scale your high-quality digital practice.

items.title: Unified content library
items.description: Keep text, voice, and video content neatly organized and searchable in one place.

items.title: Create videos from plain English
items.description: Say what you want ("5 ways to build a micro habit") and get AI-generated videos in minutes.

items.title: Instant content transformation
items.description: Text ↔︎ voice ↔︎ video with one click, so every idea ships in the right format.

items.title: Subscriptions & Programs
items.description: Launch monthly/annual subscriptions and on-demand programs to earn between and after visits.

items.title: Storefront for services & products
items.description: Sell packages, supplements, digital downloads, and wellness products—side by side.

items.title: Single secure checkout
items.description: One interface to buy everything, with PCI-compliant payments and automated receipts.

items.title: Social & site integrations
items.description: Instagram, TikTok, your website, podcast apps, and video platforms—auto-scheduler + publishing included.

items.title: National & global reach
items.description: Best-in-breed digital workflows with built-in SEO and best digital practices so new clients can find you anywhere.

items.title: Multi-model AI orchestration
items.description: We connect to top models (e.g., OpenAI, Hippocratic, Google) and route tasks to the best one—no upgrade anxiety.

items.title: Plug-in, don't replace
items.description: Works with your practice management, notes/EHR, email, and analytics—keep the tools you love.

items.title: HIPAA & compliance
items.description: Privacy-first architecture with in-built HIPAA controls and audit trails designed for healthcare.

items.title: Adaptive care plans
items.description: Each plan auto-personalizes to goals, compliance, and feedback; clients get nudges, check-ins, and progression tweaks that keep them moving.

items.title: Client progress dashboard
items.description: See real-time adherence, outcomes, and at-risk clients so you can intervene before drop-off.

client_experience.title: The Client Experience
client_experience.subtitle: How clients experience continuity of care, anywhere.

testimonial.quote: I finally had access to my coach’s guidance between sessions—stretch routines, reminders, and even progress checks. It kept me consistent and motivated.
testimonial.author: Jordan M.

cta.title: Join the Movement to Elevate Wellness Coaching
cta.description: Be among the first to build a modern, sustainable practice that grows with your clients.
cta.small_text: Limited spots available for early providers.

pricing_marketing.title: Pricing (Marketing and Branding)

plans.name: Starter Marketing
plans.tagline: Text-based marketing, Social media posts, and engagement analytics.

Automated social media posts to Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn

Multi-format calendar planning for blog + audio + video
Enhanced analytics: Top-performing formats and audience trends
